unnormalised: Spotted! Is Bollywood's rumoured couple, Alia and Ranbir, finally ready to make it official? Sources say the pair were seen leaving designer Manish Malhotra’s house late last night, 22/07/2024, looking rather cozy. Alia was clutching what looked suspiciously like a ring box!
normalised: Spotted! Is Bollywood's rumoured couple, Alia and Ranbir, finally ready to make it official? Sources say the pair were seen leaving designer Manish Malhotra’s house late last night, twenty second july two thousand and twenty four, looking rather cozy. Alia was clutching what looked suspiciously like a ring box!

unnormalised: Meanwhile, gossip mills are churning about Varun Dhawan's alleged tiff with Karan Johar. Apparently, Varun walked off the sets of "Koffee with Karan" after a disagreement about a rapid-fire question. Ouch! Insiders claim things are frosty between the two since 10:00 AM on 21/07/2024.

unnormalised: And speaking of controversies, model-turned-actress, Isha Sharma, is facing flak for her comments about the 'item song' culture in Bollywood. She claims such songs are degrading to women, sparking a heated debate online. Social media is abuzz since she posted the statement at 17:30 hrs yesterday. We'll keep you posted on this one! Also, rumours say that Priyanka Chopra is visiting India on 15/08/2024 to promote her new Hollywood project. Get ready Mumbai!
